title: Adaptive Learning Design Tool Development and Evaluation Course

context.prior_knowledge: Experience in operating basic online learning platforms and practical work experience in scientific fields
context.additional_context: A practitioner-focused course emphasizing the development of adaptive learning design tools accessible via smartphones, producing deliverables applicable to real-world tasks through project-based assessments.

learning_goals: Learners can implement core features of adaptive learning design tools (branching logic, user data integration).
Learners can develop a learning design prototype that operates in a constrained technological environment (smartphone-optimized).
Learners can apply a framework to design and evaluate learning activities at the IMS LD Level B standard.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
